title: Felicity Jones cuts a stylish figure in a white satin top for fashion event in London
text:
She has been busy promoting her new flick, The Aeronauts.

And Felicity Jones cut a stylish figure as she attended the NET-A-PORTER Incredible Women Talk at BAFTA Piccadilly in London on Wednesday night.

The actress, 35, wowed in a chic white satin top which she teamed with a pair of high-waisted trousers.

Oh so chic: Felicity Jones, 35, cut a stylish figure as she attended the NET-A-PORTER Incredible Women Talk at BAFTA Piccadilly in London on Wednesday night

The eye-catching top showed off her flair for fashion while the chic bottoms cinched in her tiny waist.

She boosted her height in a pair of towering black heels at the event.

Felicity had her brunette locks styled into a chic bun, with a few loose tendrils framing her striking features.

Wow: The actress wowed in a chic white satin top which she teamed with a pair of high-waisted trousers

Looking good: The eye-catching top showed off her flair for fashion while the chic bottoms cinched in her tiny waist - posing with Sarah Bailey

She enhanced her naturally good looks with a simple coat of blush-infused make-up and smokey eyeshadow.

Felicity has been busy promoting the new movie The Aeronauts, which also stars Eddie Redmayne.

The film's plot follows pilot Amelia Wren (Felicity) and scientist James Glaisher (Eddie) as they find themselves in perilous life-threatening situations while attempting to make discoveries in a hot air balloon.

Glam: She boosted her height in a pair of towering black heels as she posed alongside L-R: Sandra Choi, President of NET-A-PORTER and MR PORTER Alison Loehnis and Sarah Bailey

Beauty: Felicity had her brunette locks styled into a chic bun, with a few loose tendrils framing her striking features

Pretty: She enhanced her naturally good looks with a simple coat of blush-infused make-up and smokey eyeshadow

Come 1862, the pair attempted to fly higher than anyone ever had before in a hot air balloon to discover more about the weather. The attempt is still a world record to this day.

The Aeronauts currently holds an 86 per cent critic approval rating on Rotten Tomatoes.

The Aeronauts comes to UK cinemas on Wednesday November 6.

Movie star: Felicity has been busy promoting the new movie The Aeronauts, which also stars Eddie Redmayne - Pictured with President of NET-A-PORTER and MR PORTER Alison Loehnis
description: Felicity Jones, 35, cut a stylish figure as she attended the NET-A-PORTER Incredible Women Talk at BAFTA Piccadilly in London on Wednesday night.
